item.title: Upcoming 2025 Video Game Releases Running on Unreal Engine 5
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/upcoming-2025-video-game-releases-unreal-engine-5/

Have you seen how positively gorgeous Unreal Engine 5 is these days? It’s easily one of the most graphically impressive game engines on the market and is constantly being improved. Thankfully, this year, countless new big-name releases and even a few indie titles will launch while running on Unreal Engine 5. Here’s what you can look forward to!

Upcoming Unreal Engine 5 Games Launching in 2025

The sheer number of exciting upcoming games running on UE5 does impress. It bodes well for the game engine and for all of us who want a smooth, graphically enticing experience!

  • Eternal Strands (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S) – January 28
  • Avowed (PC, Xbox Series X|S) – February 18
  • Killing Floor 3 (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S – March 2025
  • ArcheAge Chronicles (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S) – 2025
  • Cronos: The New Dawn (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S) – 2025
  • Dungeon Stalkers (PC) – 2025
  • Hell Is Us (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S) – 2025
  • Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S) – 2025
  • The Sinking City 2 (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S) – 2025
  • Splitgate 2 (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S) – 2025
  • The Outer Worlds 2 (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S) – 2025

Unreal Engine 5 Games Coming in 2026 and Beyond

  • ARK II (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S)
  • Derelicts (PC)
  • EVE Vanguard (PC)
  • Halloween: The Game (TBA)
  • Perfect Dark (PC, Xbox Series X|S)
  • The Blood of Dawnwalker (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S)
  • The Witcher IV (TBA)
  • The Witcher Remake (TBA)
  • The Wolf Among Us 2: A Telltale Series (PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S)
  • Unrecord (PC)
  • Lords of the Fallen 2 (PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S)
  • Industria 2 (PC)
  • Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra (TBA)
  • Gears of War: E-Day (PC, Xbox Series X|S)

The list goes on and on and on. It’s a popular game engine with plenty of accessibility options for new and veteran game developers to utilize!

Of everything we’ve listed here, what’s the one game you’re most excited to play? Let us know in the comments, or take a trip to the Insider Gaming community forum to discuss upcoming game releases with us!

Speaking of upcoming video game releases, don’t forget to check out the new Doom: Dark Ages gameplay and release date info!
